title: [Highpark, Ridge Ramble]
description: The Ramble threads between low stone walls holding the prolific blooms of garden beds at bay.  Clouds of butterflies float over the flowers and squirrels scamper in leaps between the trunks of ornamental trees.  The lane travels steadily upward to the north, skirting the base of a landscaped hill dotted with statuary and graceful homes.

The Ramble threads between low stone walls holding the prolific blooms of garden beds at bay.  Flowers add their fragrance to the night and frogs croak from ornamental ponds.  The lane travels steadily upward to the north, skirting the base of a landscaped hill dotted with statuary and graceful homes.
